participant_1.background:
I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.
i can t drive.
i like to go out fishing.
My previous job was at a local coffee shop, but I quit to pursue my passion for LARPing.
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.

participant_2.background:
My most valued possession is my dog, because he is my best friend and always makes me happy.
i am deathly terrified of heights.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I love to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
she likes to grow plants in her garden.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just quit my job at the coffee shop, so I'm looking for something new to do.
Oh no, why did you quit?
I wanted to pursue my passion for LARPing.
It stands for live action role playing. It's basically like Dungeons and Dragons, but you act out your character in real life.
That sounds really cool! I've always been interested in D&D, but I've never had anyone to play with.
You should totally try it out! There are tons of groups that play all over the place.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, read about holistic health and natural remedies, and grow plants in my garden.
That sounds really relaxing! I love to garden too.
It's so much fun! I love seeing the plants grow and produce food.
I'm glad you're enjoying your new job!
Thanks! I'm really excited about it!
